snippet: The point guard had 23 points and San Antonio took a 3-2 lead in their series with the Mavericks.
abstract: Basketball Roundup; San Antonio Spurs defeat Dallas Mavericks, 109-103, to lead first-round playoff series, 3-2; other NBA news and playoff scores noted.

byline.original: By THE ASSOCIATED PRESS and RICHARD SANDOMIR

lead_paragraph: The point guard had 23 points and San Antonio took a 3-2 lead in their series with the Mavericks.

headline.main: Parker Helps Spurs Take Series Lead
headline.print_headline: Parker Helps Spurs Take Series Lead
